ticket_form_description_text: Please fill out the form below to create a new support ticket. Provide as much detail as possible to help us assist you efficiently.
faq_main_description: We're here to answer your questions. Search for answers or browse through categories.
or_choose_category: or choose a category to quickly find the help you need
faq_category_account_management_desc: Everything about your account, registration, and profile.
faq_account_q1: How do I register an account?
faq_account_a1: You can register by clicking 'Sign Up' on the homepage and filling out the required information.
faq_account_q2: Can I change my username or email?
faq_account_a2: Usernames cannot be changed after registration. You can update your email in your profile settings.
faq_account_q3: What if I forget my password?
faq_account_a3: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to reset your password via email.
faq_account_q4: How do I close my account?
faq_account_a4: To close your account, please contact our support team. Note that this action is irreversible.
faq_category_deposits_withdrawals_desc: Information on adding funds and cashing out your winnings.
faq_deposits_q1: How can I deposit funds into my account?
faq_deposits_a1: You can deposit funds using various cryptocurrency networks (e.g., USDT TRC20, ERC20, BEP20, BTC). Navigate to the 'Deposit' section for details.
faq_deposits_q2: What is the minimum deposit amount?
faq_deposits_a2: The minimum deposit amount varies by cryptocurrency and network. Please check the 'Deposit' page for current limits.
faq_deposits_q3: How long does a crypto deposit take to reflect in my balance?
faq_deposits_a3: Crypto deposits usually reflect after a few network confirmations, typically within 5-30 minutes, but can vary depending on network congestion.
faq_deposits_q4: How do I withdraw my winnings?
faq_deposits_a4: You can request a withdrawal from the 'Withdraw' section. Enter your wallet address, network, and the amount you wish to withdraw. Withdrawals are processed manually by our team.
faq_deposits_q5: What is the processing time for withdrawals?
faq_deposits_a5: Withdrawal requests are typically processed within 24-48 hours. You will receive a confirmation once completed.
faq_category_playing_games_desc: Rules, how to play, and managing your predictions.
faq_games_q1: How do I participate in a Toto game?
faq_games_a1: Go to the 'Games' section, select an active game, choose your predictions for each match, and submit your form.
faq_games_q2: What is the cost of a Toto prediction form?
faq_games_a2: The cost of a form depends on the number of outcomes you select for each match. Each combination has a base cost.
faq_games_q3: Can I change my predictions after submitting the form?
faq_games_a3: No, once a prediction form is submitted and confirmed, it cannot be changed or cancelled.
faq_games_q4: What happens if a match is cancelled?
faq_games_a4: If a match in a Toto game is cancelled, its outcome will be considered null, and its impact on the total score will be adjusted accordingly. If the entire game is cancelled, forms may be refunded.
faq_games_a5: Scores are calculated based on the accuracy of your predictions for each match. More correct predictions lead to a higher score.
faq_category_prizes_rewards_desc: Understanding prize distribution and claiming your winnings.
faq_prizes_a1: Prizes are distributed to top-scoring participants (e.g., 1st, 2nd, 3rd place) based on their total score in a completed game. The prize pool is announced before the game begins.
faq_prizes_q2: When can I claim my prize?
faq_prizes_a2: You can claim your prize once the game is officially completed and results are verified. A 'Claim Prize' button will appear on your 'My Predictions' page for eligible winnings.
faq_prizes_a3: You earn a commission for every new user who registers using your referral link and submits their first prediction form. The commission percentage is defined in the system settings.
faq_category_technical_support_desc: Getting help with technical issues and general inquiries.
faq_support_a1: You can contact our support team by creating a new ticket in the 'Support' section of your user panel.
faq_support_q2: How long does it take to get a response to my ticket?
faq_support_a2: Our support team aims to respond to all tickets within 24-48 hours, depending on the complexity and priority of your inquiry.
faq_support_q3: What information should I include in my support ticket?
faq_support_a3: Please include your username, the subject of your issue, a detailed description, and any relevant screenshots or transaction IDs to help us assist you faster.
contact_us_description: If you cannot find a question in our FAQ, you can always contact us. We will answer to you shortly!
always_happy_to_help: We are always happy to help!
best_way_for_faster_answer: Best way to get answer faster!
no_results_found: No results found for your search.
earning_comparison_text: You informed of this week compared to last week
total_winning_forms_desc: Total forms that won a prize
